Package com.magikvince

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Attack
    represents an attack of a Character
    It can be either a basic or special attack.
    Character
    Represents a Character of the Game.
    It can be either a Warrior, a Mage or a Rogue.
    Game
    Simulate a game and a fight between two characters
    a new round is started until one of the character has no remaining life.
    Mage
    Character is a mage.
    Main skill is intelligence.
    Main  
    Rogue
    Character is a Rogue.
    Main skill is agiliy.
    Round
    Round of a fight opposing 2 characters in a game
    First active Character chooses an attack
    then we calculate damage given to each characters and we update remaining life for both characters
    if nobody is dead we continue the fight to next round
    we change the activeCharacter for next round.
    Warrior
    Character is a Warrior.
    Main skill is strength.
